explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of ensemble machine learning methods for portfolio rebalancing.
explanations.supervised learning: The methods used (SVM, decision tree, neural network) are typically supervised learning techniques.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper explicitly mentions using SVM as one of the heterogeneous basic models in ensemble learning.
explanations.SVM: Abbreviation for support vector machine, which is used in the proposed method.
explanations.decision tree: The paper mentions using decision tree as one of the basic models in ensemble learning.
explanations.neural network: The paper mentions using multilayer perceptron neural network as one of the basic models.
explanations.deep learning: The use of neural networks (specifically multilayer perceptron) suggests some relevance to deep learning, though not explicitly stated.
